channel.description: Recent content in Home on YiLab

item.title: Prof. Keke Yi, PI
item.description: Iâ€™m a group leader of soil-plant interaction at the Institute of Agricultural Resources and Regional Planning (IARRP) from the Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences (CAAS). My group is working with the molecular mechanism of Pi uptake and homeostasis in plants. We are also interested with how the plants sense the external nutrition availability to modulate growth. Research Interests: Function and Evolution of Phosphate Transporter Plant nutritions Cell and Develpment Biology

item.title: Xianqing Jia, PostDoc
item.description: Xianqing finished his PhD study at Nanjing University and joined our lab in June 2020. He has board interest in evolution of genomic features accompanied by morphologic changes in plants. Research Interests: Evo-Devo Molecular Genetics and Evolution Bioinformatics Multi-omics analysis Education: 2017.09 - 2020.06, PhD in Biology, Nanjing University 2014.09 - 2017.06, MEng in Pharmacy engineering, Nanjing University 2010.09 - 2014.06, BS in Biotechnology, Qinghai University

item.title: Publications
item.description: Latest update: 2021-02-05 2021 Wang, L., Jia, X., Zhang, Y., Xu, L., Menand, B., Zhao, H., Zeng, H., Dolan, L., Zhu, Y., & Yi, K. (2021). Loss of two families of SPX domain-containing proteins required for vacuolar polyphosphate accumulation coincides with the transition to phosphate storage in green plants. Molecular Plant, 0(0). [Link] [PubMed] 2020 Wang, L., Xiao, L., Yang, H., Chen, G., Zeng, H., Zhao, H.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Hugo is a static site engine written in Go. It makes use of a variety of open source projects including: Cobra Viper J Walter Weatherman Cast Learn more and contribute on GitHub. Setup Some fun facts about Hugo: Built in Go Loosely inspired by Jekyll Primarily developed by spf13 on the train while commuting to and from Manhattan. Coded in Vim using spf13-vim Have questions or suggestions?
